name: Knight Platformer (owenmyoven)
description:
This is a game I made for the Scratch Jam 2021.

WASD to move

Press 1 to switch to sword dash mode

Sword Dash has a one-second cooldown.

Press 2 to switch to wall jump mode

Sword Dash by left-clicking in the air.

Wall Jump by holding up when you hit a wall.

Press T to open the timer

Goal: Reach the top of this mountain

Good Luck!
